text: The Mayor Vitaliano D. Agan Coliseum https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzjWd8iSYqqecVF0Y3ItZmluQlk/view is an indoor multi-purpose sports arena located in the City of Zamboanga in the island of Mindanao, Philippines. It is one of the biggest air-conditioned coliseum in Mindanao that can accommodate up to 10,000 spectators. It has also been the home of the PBA in the Zamboanga Peninsula. ==Events== ===Inauguration=== Zamboanga City Coliseum in Barangay Tetuan, was the center of the grand celebration of Dia de Zamboanga last February 26, 2002. It was formally Inaugurated by President Gloria Macapagal-Aroyo ===Regular events=== The coliseum is one of the venues the Philippine Basketball Association in the Zamboanga Peninsula for the past decade. It also a regular host of boxing events in the city and is currently the host of festival events, such us the Hermosa Street Dance Festival & Cheer Dance Competitions ==References== Category:Basketball venues in the Philippines Category:Indoor arenas in the Philippines Category:Landmarks in the Philippines Category:Boxing venues in the Philippines Category:Buildings and structures in Zamboanga City Category:Buildings and structures completed in 2002 Category:Sports in Zamboanga del Sur Category:2002 establishments in the Philippines
title: Mayor Vitaliano D. Agan Coliseum
